svg.style: background: #ffffff; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content:
<mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/145.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" version="29.5.1" scale="1" border="0"> <diagram id="lW8Nod4bNlMQTEJj9150" name="í˜ì´ì§€-1"> <mxGraphModel dx="1138" dy="873" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="2000" pageHeight="1200" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="user" parent="1" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#e3f2fd;strokeColor=#1565c0;fontStyle=1;fontSize=12;" value="ğŸ‘¤ User
(HTTPS Request)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="75" width="120" x="20" y="290" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="developer" parent="1" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#f1f8e9;strokeColor=#2e7d32;fontStyle=1;fontSize=12;" value="ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’» Developer / Ops" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="70" width="120" x="20" y="840" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="zone_saas" parent="1" style="swimlane;startSize=30;fillColor=#f3e5f5;strokeColor=#7b1fa2;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1;fontSize=13;fontColor=#7b1fa2;" value="â˜ï¸ External SaaS" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="130" width="230" x="1720" y="200" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="slack" parent="zone_saas" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#ce93d8;strokeColor=#7b1fa2;fontStyle=1;fontSize=13;" value="ğŸ’¬ Slack" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="50" width="150" x="40" y="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="zone_k8s" parent="1" style="swimlane;startSize=38;fillColor=#e3f2fd;strokeColor=#1565c0;strokeWidth=3;fontStyle=1;fontSize=15;fontColor=#1565c0;" value="ğŸ’» Local PC: Kubernetes Cluster (kubeadm / upstream Kubernetes)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="650" width="1530" x="160" y="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="zone_master" parent="zone_k8s" style="swimlane;startSize=45;fillColor=#bbdefb;strokeColor=#1976d2;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1;fontSize=12;fontColor=#1976d2;dashed=1;dashPattern=8 4;" value="ğŸ”µ Master Node VM
(Control Plane Only â€” No User Traffic)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="560" width="320" x="20" y="58" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="k8s_cp" parent="zone_master" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#1976d2;strokeColor=#0d47a1;fontColor=#ffffff;fontStyle=1;fontSize=11;" value="â˜¸ï¸ K8s Control Plane
(API Server, Scheduler,
Controller Manager, etcd)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="80" width="250" x="35" y="65" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="argocd" parent="zone_master" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#f57c00;strokeColor=#e65100;fontColor=#ffffff;fontStyle=1;fontSize=12;" value="ğŸ”„ Argo CD
(GitOps Controller)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="65" width="200" x="60" y="220" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="master_note" parent="zone_master" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#fff9c4;strokeColor=#f9a825;fontSize=11;fontStyle=2;rounded=1;" value="âš ï¸ ì™¸ë¶€ ì‚¬ìš©ì íŠ¸ë˜í”½
ì§„ì… ì—†ìŒ" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="60" width="220" x="50" y="440" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="zone_worker1" parent="zone_k8s" style="swimlane;startSize=35;fillColor=#e8f5e9;strokeColor=#2e7d32;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1;fontSize=12;fontColor=#2e7d32;dashed=1;dashPattern=8 4;" value="âš™ï¸ Worker Node VM 1 â€” Workload" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="560" width="540" x="370" y="58" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="metallb" parent="zone_worker1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#1e88e5;strokeColor=#0d47a1;fontColor=#ffffff;fontStyle=1;fontSize=11;" value="ğŸ”€ MetalLB + Ingress Controller
(ingress-nginx)
â† ì™¸ë¶€ íŠ¸ë˜í”½ ì§„ì…ì " vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="75" width="230" x="155" y="55" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="frontend" parent="zone_worker1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#42a5f5;strokeColor=#1565c0;fontColor=#ffffff;fontStyle=1;fontSize=12;" value="ğŸ–¥ï¸ Frontend Service" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="55" width="190" x="175" y="175" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="zone_micro" parent="zone_worker1" style="swimlane;startSize=28;fillColor=#e1f5fe;strokeColor=#0277bd;fontSize=11;fontStyle=1;" value="Backend Microservices (gRPC) â€” Worker 1 ì „ë‹´ ë°°ì¹˜" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="160" width="480" x="30" y="275" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cart" parent="zone_micro" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#4fc3f7;strokeColor=#0277bd;fontSize=11;fontStyle=1;" value="ğŸ›’ Cart" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="45" width="100" x="20" y="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="product" parent="zone_micro" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#4fc3f7;strokeColor=#0277bd;fontSize=11;fontStyle=1;" value="ğŸ“¦ Product
Catalog" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="45" width="100" x="140" y="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="currency" parent="zone_micro" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#4fc3f7;strokeColor=#0277bd;fontSize=11;fontStyle=1;" value="ğŸ’± Currency" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="45" width="100" x="260" y="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="others" parent="zone_micro" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#4fc3f7;strokeColor=#0277bd;fontSize=11;fontStyle=1;" value="... Others" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="45" width="90" x="370" y="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="promtail1" parent="zone_worker1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#ad1457;strokeColor=#880e4f;fontColor=#ffffff;fontStyle=1;fontSize=11;" value="ğŸ“‹ Promtail
(Log Collector)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="55" width="160" x="60" y="480" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="workernode1_box" parent="zone_worker1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#388e3c;strokeColor=#1b5e20;fontColor=#ffffff;fontStyle=1;fontSize=11;" value="ğŸ–¥ï¸ kubelet / containerd" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="55" width="180" x="300" y="480" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e_metallb_fe" edge="1" parent="zone_worker1" source="metallb" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;strokeColor=#1565c0;strokeWidth=2.5;fontSize=11;" target="frontend"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> <mxCell id="root" as="value" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e_fe_cart" edge="1" parent="zone_worker1" source="frontend" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;strokeColor=#0277bd;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=10;" target="cart"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> <mxCell id="root" as="value" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e_fe_product" edge="1" parent="zone_worker1" source="frontend" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;strokeColor=#0277bd;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=10;" target="product"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> <mxCell id="root" as="value" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e_fe_currency" edge="1" parent="zone_worker1" source="frontend" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;strokeColor=#0277bd;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=10;" target="currency"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> <mxCell id="root" as="value" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e_fe_others" edge="1" parent="zone_worker1" source="frontend" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;strokeColor=#0277bd;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=10;" target="others"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> <mxCell id="root" as="value" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="zone_worker2" parent="zone_k8s" style="swimlane;startSize=35;fillColor=#fff3e0;strokeColor=#e65100;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1;fontSize=12;fontColor=#e65100;dashed=1;dashPattern=8 4;" value="âš™ï¸ Worker Node VM 2 â€” Workload + Observability" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="560" width="560" x="940" y="58" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="zone_scrape" parent="zone_worker2" style="swimlane;startSize=25;fillColor=#f1f8e9;strokeColor=#558b2f;fontSize=11;fontStyle=1;" value="ğŸ“Š Scrape Targets" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="120" width="510" x="20" y="55" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="st1" parent="zone_scrape" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#aed581;strokeColor=#558b2f;fontSize=10;" value="ingress-nginx/metrics" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="35" width="110" x="10" y="35" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="st2" parent="zone_scrape" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#aed581;strokeColor=#558b2f;fontSize=10;" value="node-exporter" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="35" width="110" x="135" y="35" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="st3" parent="zone_scrape" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#aed581;strokeColor=#558b2f;fontSize=10;" value="kube-state-metrics" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="35" width="110" x="260" y="35" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="st4" parent="zone_scrape" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#aed581;strokeColor=#558b2f;fontSize=10;" value="app services/metrics" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="35" width="110" x="385" y="35" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="prometheus" parent="zone_worker2" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#ff8f00;strokeColor=#e65100;fontColor=#ffffff;fontStyle=1;fontSize=12;" value="ğŸ“ˆ Prometheus" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="60" width="160" x="60" y="230" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="alertmanager" parent="zone_worker2" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#f4511e;strokeColor=#bf360c;fontColor=#ffffff;fontStyle=1;fontSize=12;" value="ğŸš¨ Alertmanager" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="60" width="160" x="320" y="230" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="loki" parent="zone_worker2" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#ff8f00;strokeColor=#e65100;fontColor=#ffffff;fontStyle=1;fontSize=12;" value="ğŸ—‚ï¸ Loki
(Log Store)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="60" width="160" x="185" y="350" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="promtail2" parent="zone_worker2" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#ad1457;strokeColor=#880e4f;fontColor=#ffffff;fontStyle=1;fontSize=11;" value="ğŸ“‹ Promtail
(Log Collector)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="55" width="160" x="60" y="460" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="workernode2_box" parent="zone_worker2" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#bf360c;strokeColor=#7f0000;fontColor=#ffffff;fontStyle=1;fontSize=11;" value="ğŸ–¥ï¸ kubelet / containerd" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="55" width="180" x="310" y="460" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e_prom_scrape" edge="1" parent="zone_worker2" source="prometheus" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;strokeColor=#c62828;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=10;dashed=1;dashPattern=6 3;" target="zone_scrape"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> <mxCell id="root" as="value" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e_prom_alert" edge="1" parent="zone_worker2" source="prometheus" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;strokeColor=#c62828;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=10;" target="alertmanager"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> <mxCell id="root" as="value" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e_pt2_loki" edge="1" parent="zone_worker2" source="promtail2" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;strokeColor=#ad1457;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=10;" target="loki"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> <mxCell id="root" as="value" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="zone_minipc" parent="1" style="swimlane;startSize=38;fillColor=#fafafa;strokeColor=#424242;strokeWidth=3;fontStyle=1;fontSize=14;fontColor=#424242;" value="ğŸ–¥ï¸ Mini PC (Platform Server) â‘ CI/CD & GitOps Flow" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="200" width="1530" x="160" y="770" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gitlab_server" parent="zone_minipc" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#fc6d26;strokeColor=#e24329;fontColor=#ffffff;fontStyle=1;fontSize=12;" value="ğŸ¦Š GitLab Server
(app-repo)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="70" width="170" x="60" y="75" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gitlab_ci" parent="zone_minipc" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#fc6d26;strokeColor=#e24329;fontColor=#ffffff;fontStyle=1;fontSize=12;" value="âš™ï¸ GitLab CI
(Runner)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="70" width="170" x="310" y="75" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gitops_repo" parent="zone_minipc" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#546e7a;strokeColor=#263238;fontColor=#ffffff;fontStyle=1;fontSize=12;" value="ğŸ“ gitops-repo
(Manifests / Image Tag)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="70" width="185" x="570" y="75" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="registry" parent="zone_minipc" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#7e57c2;strokeColor=#4527a0;fontColor=#ffffff;fontStyle=1;fontSize=12;" value="ğŸ“¦ GitLab Container
Registry" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="70" width="170" x="870" y="75" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="grafana" parent="zone_minipc" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#e65100;strokeColor=#bf360c;fontColor=#ffffff;fontStyle=1;fontSize=12;" value="ğŸ“Š Grafana
(Dashboard UI)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="70" width="170" x="1240" y="75" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e_gitlab_ci_trigger" edge="1" parent="zone_minipc" source="gitlab_server" id="e_ci_registry" edge="1" parent="zone_minipc" source="gitlab_ci" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;strokeColor=#e65100;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=11;" target="registry"> <mxGeometry relative="1" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;strokeColor=#e65100;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=11;" target="gitops_repo"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="395" y="40" /> width="110" x="10" y="190" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212));

ellipse.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(227, 242, 253), rgb(20, 33, 42)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(21, 101, 192), rgb(99, 168, 246));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 269px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

ellipse.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(241, 248, 233), rgb(22, 28, 15)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(46, 125, 50), rgb(100, 168, 104));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 816px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(243, 229, 245), rgb(45, 33, 47)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(123, 31, 162), rgb(239, 160, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 148px; height: 1px; padding-top: 216px; margin-left: 1741px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(227, 242, 253), rgb(20, 33, 42)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(21, 101, 192), rgb(99, 168, 246));

g.text: ğŸ’» Local PC: Kubernetes Cluster (kubeadm / upstream Kubernetes)

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(187, 222, 251), rgb(25, 55, 80)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(25, 118, 210), rgb(79, 159, 238));

g.text: (Control Plane Only â€” No User Traffic)
